code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./ProfileForm.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileForm=()=>{const[profile,setProfile]=useState({name:"",email:"",zerodhaKey:"",zerodhaSecret:""});const handleChange=e=>{setProfile({...profile,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log("Profile Updated:",profile);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Update Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",value:profile.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter your name"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",value:profile.email,readOnly:true,placeholder:"Your email"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Zerodha API Key"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"zerodhaKey",value:profile.zerodhaKey,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter Zerodha API Key"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Zerodha API Secret"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"zerodhaSecret",value:profile.zerodhaSecret,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter Zerodha API Secret"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-save",children:"Save"})]})]})});};export default ProfileForm;
